full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RAB GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013B (CES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RAB GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI PHYAG MDZOD PA BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL MCHOG THU DE'I CHING NO YON SBYIN PA AER KHE NANG SO, ,BSTAN 'DZIN NOM CHE NGAG BSKOS, ,'JAM DBYANGS THON GA LAG PI LIG THU, ,BSTAN PA TSE RING HOR TSA PI LIG THU RNAM GYIS MDZOD BTAGS CHE BA, ,SMA RNYING YUG MDZOD GOS SER PO, ,YUG BSOD BTAGS LNGA BCAS BSTABS TE KHA KHA DO LU 'U KHO SHO'U GI SBYIN BDAG GRVA RIGS TSA MANG, ,NGAG 'DON BGYIS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS @014A *, ,PHO BRANG PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
